sentences.en: " Now it'll be all over town,'said Rhett savagely.
sentences.cn: " 马上全城都会 知道 了, "瑞德恶狠狠地说.

sentences.en: " Where do you think you're going? " the thin - faced soldier demanded savagely.
sentences.cn: “ 站住,走哪儿去? ” 那个瘦脸的兵恶狠狠地问道.

sentences.en: "What do you want!" she whispered savagely. "Get out."
sentences.cn: “你想干什么！”她粗野地低语道，“滚开。”

sentences.en: Getting up, Alex savagely punched a bell push on the wall, knowing it would summon help.
sentences.cn: 亚历克斯站起身, 粗暴地按了按墙上的电铃, 他知道一按电铃就会来人.

sentences.en: He gripped the arms of the chair so savagely that every finger end was stinging.
sentences.cn: 他狠狠地抓住椅子的把手,弄得每个指尖都发痛了.

sentences.en: He walked up and down, batting his head savagely with his fists, but he could not conquer the numbness of sleep.
sentences.cn: 他走来走去，用拳头野蛮地捶脑袋，仍证服不了沉重的睡意。

sentences.en: He wrote romantic poetry before the war and then , in the mid - twenties, turned savagely against humanity.
sentences.cn: 战前, 他写浪漫诗;二十年代 中期, 他转而激烈反对古典文学.

sentences.en: It was only in the autumn that business conditions turned savagely down.
sentences.cn: 当年的经济形势也仅仅是从秋天才开始急剧恶化的.

sentences.en: The driver pressed on the accelerator, savagely roaring the engine.
sentences.cn: 司机踩下油门踏板, 引擎轰鸣.

sentences.en: The master tied me to a pillar and whipped me savagely.
sentences.cn: 主人把我捆在一根柱子上,恶狠狠地用鞭子抽我.

sentences.en: The roses had been pruned back savagely.
sentences.cn: 玫瑰被狠狠地修剪了一番.

sentences.en: The tiger pounced savagely on the goat.
sentences.cn: 那只老虎凶暴地突袭那只山羊.

sentences.en: The writing is brutally tough and savagely humorous.
sentences.cn: 该作品带有残酷的强悍和野性的幽默感。

sentences.en: You mind your own business, shouted the landlord, turning savagely on him.
sentences.cn: 你少管闲事!店老板叫着, 凶恶地看他一眼.
